The [[Ten Commandments]] are a set of principles from the [[Torah]] relating to ethics and moral which play a fundamental role in the moral code of [[Judaism]] and most forms of [[Christianity]].
 
The [[Ten Commandments]] are a set of principles from the [[Torah]] relating to ethics and moral which play a fundamental role in the moral code of [[Judaism]] and most forms of [[Christianity]].
  +   +
== Morality vs Ethics ==
  +
[[Ethics]] and Morality both related to “right” and “wrong” conduct.
  +   +
Ethics are rules provided to an individual by an external source like the [[society]] or their profession.
  +   +
Morality are rules provided to an individual by Internal believe and according [[cultural]] norms like religions.
